document.full_text: for much of the world, japan's nuclear crisis has heightened concerns about nuclear power. but in the u.s. southeast, where the next set of reactors are planned, the concerns are not so great.
document.title: welcome mat still out for new u.s. nuclear plants
lines_and_colors: for much of the world, japan's nuclear crisis has heightened concerns about nuclear power. but in the u.s. southeast, where the next set of reactors are planned, the concerns are not so great.
